COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c
STRING: In the stillness of the morning, my eyes opened by
themselves.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x158
STRING: There was absolute quiet in the room, and the cold air
caressed my face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x164
STRING: I had something I must do immediately after getting up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x170
STRING: I had to write a response to Arie's letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17c
STRING: If I was able to send it this morning, it would still reach
her on the same day it always did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192
STRING: That way I wouldn't make her worry unnecessarily, and
she would feel at ease sooner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a8
STRING: But... I couldn't help but be aware that the fact I was
thinking about this, was already the seeds of betrayal
coming to fruit.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c8
STRING: I was already making her worry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d4
STRING: It weighed on me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e0
STRING: This was nothing less than evidence that I was thinking
of, and beginning to betray her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f6
STRING: “Do what you think is right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x202
STRING: That was indeed what Arie had said in her letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20e
STRING: “No matter what that may be.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a
STRING: Had Arie... Arietta, realized what was going on?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x226
STRING: Or, was it Tortinita that had realized?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x232
STRING: Either way, it didn't seem like the end result would
change much.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23e
STRING: Torta would probably continue to tell Arie about me,
and I didn't intend to stop her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x254
STRING: Something that couldn't just be expressed by my letters
alone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x260
STRING: Even if it were the truth, or even if it was only Torta
imagining things...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x276
STRING: It was all Arie had.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x282
STRING: Arie could only know what was going on from our two
letters.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x298
STRING: Which meant, I had to write to her...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a4
STRING: So that Arie could know about me, even just a little
more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b0
STRING: So that Arie could know the truth, even just a little
more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e0
STRING: [Phorni] “Isn't it a little early for that kind of face?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f6
STRING: [Chris] “...Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x314
STRING: [Phorni] “Morning. You haven't answered my question.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32a
STRING: [Chris] “I haven't looked in the mirror, so I don't know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34a
STRING: Phorni descended gently next to my pillow, and stared
at me with a fed up look on her face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37c
STRING: [Phorni] “What about your letter?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3aa
STRING: You haven't even
written it yet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b6
STRING: [Chris] “I'll do it soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e8
STRING: [Phorni] “And after that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fe
STRING: [Chris] “After? I haven't thought about that. It's a day off,
so I was going to just relax.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43a
STRING: [Phorni] “What?!

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x468
STRING: You're such a meanie, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x474
STRING: [Chris] “How is that mean...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a6
STRING: [Phorni] “You didn't let me sing last night! You came
home late, and then went to sleep saying you were
tired.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4de
STRING: I stayed up pretty late waiting, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f4
STRING: [Chris] “...Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x526
STRING: [Phorni] “C'mon, isn't there something else you should
say, instead of apologizing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x546
STRING: [Chris] “What would that be?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x578
STRING: [Phorni] “Are you still half asleep...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x58e
STRING: [Chris] “Maybe. I have no idea what you're getting at.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c0
STRING: [Phorni] “What?!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d6
STRING: [Chris] “That's not going to make me understand any
quicker...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x608
STRING: [Phorni] “I want to sing!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x61e
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, Ohhh. So that's it...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x650
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey!

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x67e
STRING: It might not mean that much to you,
Chris, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x694
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry, what I meant was, I don't mind if that's all
it is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d0
STRING: [Phorni] “Really...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e6
STRING: [Chris] “What are you being so suspicious about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x718
STRING: [Phorni] “Well, I always sing on Sunday nights, right?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x746
STRING: And
then suddenly last night, I couldn't so...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75c
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni... No, don't worry about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x772
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x788
STRING: For no apparent reason, I thought of Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x794
STRING: At the moment, I was all that Phorni had.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a0
STRING: All she could do was look out the window the whole
day, or sing by herself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b6
STRING: And everything else she did depended on my actions.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c2
STRING: She could sing along because I played the Fortelle; she
was able to go outside because I invited her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d8
STRING: Perhaps I'd underestimated just how important that was
to Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ee
STRING: [Chris] “...Sorry. How about we spend the whole day
performing ensembles?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x820
STRING: [Phorni] “Huh? Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x836
STRING: [Chris] “We can start anytime, once I've written my
letter. I don't have anyone else I'm supposed to practice
with today, either.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x872
STRING: [Phorni] “If you did, you wouldn't play for me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x888
STRING: [Chris] “Nah, even if I did, I'd still play for you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ba
STRING: [Phorni] “...Good boy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d0
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x902
STRING: [Phorni] “W-Why are you saying that so seriously?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x918
STRING: [Chris] “Did you want me to make it a joke instead?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x936
STRING: [Phorni] “Th-That's not what I meant.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x94c
STRING: [Chris] “Aha-ha. Anyway, I'll be finished writing my letter
soon, so just wait a little bit longer, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x988
STRING: [Phorni] “...Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e4
STRING: [Phorni] “Mmm... Hmm... Ahh...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa12
STRING: Phew... It's been a while.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa1e
STRING: [Chris] “...Was that sarcasm? It's only one day later
than usual.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5a
STRING: [Phorni] “Yes, that was sarcasm, directed at the boy
who forgot all about me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7a
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay, ready?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaac
STRING: [Phorni] “Ready!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae6
STRING: I'd been playing nothing but Lise's song recently, but my
fingers surprised me with how smoothly they moved,
and the first few chords sounded beautiful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb06
STRING: As always, Phorni took the music into herself and
overlaid it with her voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1c
STRING: Despite her small body, her voice was as loud as any
human's, and she produced a harmony so beautifully
clear that it seemed to pass straight through you.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb3c
STRING: The gentle motion of her wings reflected the song's
rhythm.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb48
STRING: The sounds were a part of her, and the song expressed
itself from within her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb5e
STRING: There was a certain sense of unity in our ensembles that
I didn't really feel from my ensembles with Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb74
STRING: It was impossible to put into words what was different.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb80
STRING: If you took away the fact that Phorni wasn't human, I felt
there was no reason Fal couldn't achieve this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbcc
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe2
STRING: [Chris] “Wh-What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc08
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris, you were getting distracted, weren't
you?!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc1e
STRING: She'd stopped me so suddenly that both my brain and
my body froze up and didn't work for a while.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc34
STRING: [Chris] “What are you talking about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc52
STRING: [Phorni] “We were doing so well, but then your sound
went all wonky.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc72
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Did it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca4
STRING: [Phorni] “You were thinking of something else, weren't
you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcba
STRING: [Chris] “No... Well, yeah, it happens sometimes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcec
STRING: [Phorni] “Grr, I don't like this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd02
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, I admit it. I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd18
STRING: I apologized frankly, and instead of getting angry,
Phorni muttered something with an almost sheepish
look on her face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd4a
STRING: [Phorni] “Don't apologize...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd60
STRING: [Chris] “Why...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd7e
STRING: [Phorni] “I was just being selfish.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd94
STRING: [Chris] “What are you saying?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb2
STRING: [Phorni] “I said...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc8
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdde
STRING: I tried to sound as gentle as possible.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdea
STRING: [Chris] “...You dummy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe1c
STRING: [Phorni] “Wh-What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe32
STRING: [Chris] “I said that you're a dummy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe48
STRING: Even I knew that my face had broken into a smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe66
STRING: I poked her forehead with the tip of my finger, which
almost made her fall over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe98
STRING: [Phorni] “You're the dummy, Chris!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeae
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, that's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xecc
STRING: [Phorni] “Say it again!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee2
STRING: [Chris] “Nope.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf14
STRING: [Phorni] “Dummy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf2a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, dummy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5c
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah, you said that about me, didn't you!?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf72
STRING: [Chris] “That was about both of us.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa4
STRING: [Phorni] “Gah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfba
STRING: [Chris] “Come on, let's forget about that and go back to
practicing. I won't think about anything else.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff6
STRING: [Phorni] “Really...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100c
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, I promise.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x103e
STRING: [Phorni] “In that case, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1054
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106a
STRING: I lightly rubbed her fluttering wings, then turned to face
the Fortelle once more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10cc
STRING: Usually, the days before the New Year were supposed
to pass by uneventfully.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e2
STRING: For the past two years, after spending Natale with Arie,
having a quiet night at home and not taking part in the
festivities on December 31st was the way I enjoyed
this season now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1102
STRING: But this year, things would get a little noisy, it seemed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110e
STRING: With the songs of a tiny fairy, whom I might have to
part ways with in a few months.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1124
STRING: With the sounds of my beloved Fortelle, played
however I wanted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1130
STRING: And of course, with the songs for my graduation recital
that I'd had Phorni learn, so that I could practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x115e
STRING: I felt that it had been a while since I had last been able
spend time like this, without thinking about anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1174
STRING: Being in a place completely cut off from the rest of the
world...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1180
STRING: With a fairy that nobody knows of...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x118c
STRING: Just playing the music we loved...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1198
STRING: Time passed ever so pleasantly.
